media.headline: Segura jogs around tag, base
media.blurb: SEA@HOU: Segura takes a long route to second on walk
media.bigblurb: As Mitch Haniger walks, Jean Segura takes an extremely long route to get to second base, including dodging Jose Altuve's tag

media.headline: Springer's leadoff long ball
media.blurb: SEA@HOU: Springer continues great start, goes deep
media.bigblurb: George Springer gives the Astros the lead in the 1st as he clears the left-field wall, picking up his third homer of the early season

media.headline: Gurriel gets Dyson at first
media.blurb: SEA@HOU: Gurriel nabs Dyson after call overturned
media.bigblurb: Jerrod Dyson reached on a single after he beats Yulieski Gurriel's throw, but the Astros challenge and the call is overturned in the 2nd

media.headline: Haniger's solo homer
media.blurb: SEA@HOU: Haniger hammers a solo dinger to left
media.bigblurb: Mitch Haniger rips a solo home run over the left-field wall for his first long ball of the season, tying the score at 1

media.headline: Gonzalez's solo tater
media.blurb: SEA@HOU: Gonzalez belts a solo shot in the 3rd
media.bigblurb: Marwin Gonzalez gives the Astros a 2-1 lead in the bottom of the 3rd inning as he rips a solo homer to left field

media.headline: Springer falls in stands on grab
media.blurb: SEA@HOU: Springer snags foul, falls into the seats
media.bigblurb: George Springer makes a great catch on Jean Segura's foul ball in the 5th inning before falling into the stands

media.headline: Seager starts timely double play
media.blurb: SEA@HOU: Seager gets a key double play in 5th
media.bigblurb: Kyle Seager fields Jose Altuve's grounder and throws out the lead runner at home plate before the Mariners complete a double play at first

media.headline: Miranda gets out of a jam in 5th
media.blurb: SEA@HOU: Miranda strands bases loaded on lineout
media.bigblurb: Ariel Miranda strands the bases loaded to end the 5th as he gets Robinson Cano to line out to second

media.headline: Seager's RBI groundout
media.blurb: SEA@HOU: Seager plates run on grounder to first
media.bigblurb: Kyle Seager brings home Mitch Haniger on a ground ball to the right side in the 6th, tying the score at 2

media.headline: Throwback to Springer's dances
media.blurb: SEA@HOU: Fans wants more Springer dugout dancing
media.bigblurb: An Astros fan tweets about why George Springer has stopped his dugout dance routines from years past

media.headline: Dyson's go-ahead RBI single
media.blurb: SEA@HOU: Dyson gives Mariners lead on RBI single
media.bigblurb: Jarrod Dyson gives the Mariners a 3-2 lead in the 9th as his single to left-center field brings home Taylor Motter

media.headline: Segura's RBI single
media.blurb: SEA@HOU: Segura adds to lead with RBI single in 9th
media.bigblurb: Jean Segura rips a single through the right side to score Guillermo Heredia, extending the Mariners' lead to 4-2

media.headline: Haniger doubles off Aoki
media.blurb: SEA@HOU: Haniger throws out Aoki, Cano freezes runner
media.bigblurb: Mitch Haniger throws out Norichika Aoki at first base after Aoki is frozen by a Robinson Cano deke on a ball hit by George Springer

media.headline: Diaz closes it out with a K
media.blurb: SEA@HOU: Diaz picks up his first save of the season
media.bigblurb: Edwin Diaz gets Norichika Aoki swinging at a ball in the dirt to close out the game, preserving the Mariners' 4-2 win

media.headline: Miranda fans Marisnick
media.blurb: SEA@HOU: Miranda strikes out Marisnick to end the 4th
media.bigblurb: Ariel Miranda records his fourth strikeout of his outing as he gets Jake Marisnick swinging to end the 4th inning

media.headline: Altuve hustles, beats out single
media.blurb: SEA@HOU: Altuve beats out infield single in the 1st
media.bigblurb: Jose Altuve chops a slow grounder to first base but never stops running and beats it out for an infield single

media.headline: Gurriel's nifty stop
media.blurb: SEA@HOU: Gurriel snags a grounder, starts double play
media.bigblurb: Yulieski Gurriel reacts quickly to Robinson Cano's sharply hit ball in the 1st and starts a 3-6-1 double play

media.headline: Musgrove sits down Cruz
media.blurb: SEA@HOU: Musgrove records second K of the day
media.bigblurb: Joe Musgrove starts off his fourth inning of work by striking out Nelson Cruz, the second strikeout of his outing

media.headline: Statcast: Springer's 454-ft HR
media.blurb: SEA@HOU: Springer crushes a leadoff 454-ft homer
media.bigblurb: Statcast measures the exit velocity, launch angle and projected distance on George Springer's leadoff home run against the Mariners

media.headline: Hinch on loss to Mariners
media.blurb: SEA@HOU: Hinch discusses series win, plate discipline
media.bigblurb: Astros manager A.J. Hinch discusses series win over the Mariners despite dropping the finale, guys swinging the bats and plate discipline

media.headline: Servais on first win, bullpen
media.blurb: SEA@HOU: Servais on first win, bullpen success
media.bigblurb: Mariners manager Scott Servais discusses the strength of the team's bullpen that led them to their first victory of the season

media.headline: Altavilla strikes out the side
media.blurb: SEA@HOU: Altavilla fans the side, earns first win
media.bigblurb: Dan Altavilla records punchouts for all three outs in the bottom of the 8th, and earns his first career win

media.headline: Giles, Altuve on Astros' loss
media.blurb: SEA@HOU: Giles, Altuve discuss loss to Mariners
media.bigblurb: Astros pitcher Ken Giles and second baseman Jose Altuve discuss optimism after the team was unable to sweep the Mariners in a four-game set

media.headline: Recap: SEA 4, HOU 2
media.blurb: 4/6/17: Dyson's late RBI single lifts the Mariners
media.bigblurb: Daily Recap: Jarrod Dyson brought home the go-ahead run on a single in the 9th, giving the Mariners their first victory of the season

media.headline: 4/6/17 CG: SEA@HOU
media.blurb: 4/6/17 Condensed Game: SEA@HOU
media.bigblurb: 4/6/17 Condensed Game: SEA@HOU
